description.title: Intel 14th Gen Core i9 14900K Desktop PC
description.details:
The Intel 14th Gen Core i9 14900K Desktop PC is the ideal gaming machine. This PC boasts lightning-fast speed and flawless multitasking thanks to the newest Raptor Lake Core i9 14900K Processor. The GIGABYTE Z790 AERO G 13th & 12th Gen ATX Motherboard delivers steady and consistent performance, while the CORSAIR DOMINATOR PLATINUM RGB DDR5 32GB DDR5 5600MHz CL40 Desktop RAM gives enough memory for even the most demanding games and programs. The Value-Top T5 Custom Premium Extended XXL E-ATX Gaming Tower Casing offers plenty of space for additional components and cooling solutions, while the Asus ROG STRIX LC II ARGB 360MM CPU Cooler keeps your processor running cool and quiet. The Samsung 990 Pro 2TB PCIe 4.0 M.2 NVMe SSD provides lightning-fast storage, and the Antec HCG 1000 Gold Fully Modular Power Supply ensures stable and efficient power delivery. With this PC, you'll be able to take your gaming to the next level and experience the ultimate in performance and reliability.

description.title: Intel 13th Gen Core i9 13900K Gaming Desktop PC
description.details:
The Intel 13th Gen Core i9-13900K Gaming Desktop PC is a high-performance powerhouse designed for gaming enthusiasts. It features the Intel 13th Gen Core i9-13900K Raptor Lake Processor paired with the GIGABYTE Z790 UD AX ATX Motherboard and comes equipped with 16GB of Kingston FURY Beast 6000MHz DDR5 RGB Desktop RAM. The PC boasts a spacious 2TB Samsung PM9A1 M.2 PCIe Gen 4.0 NVMe SSD for lightning-fast storage access. To keep the CPU cool during intensive tasks, it utilizes the Corsair iCUE H150i ELITE CAPELLIX XT RGB Liquid CPU Cooler. The PC is housed in the stylish Lian Li LANCOOL III Mid-Tower E-ATX Gaming Case. For graphics power, it features the Colorful iGame GeForce RTX 4080 16GB Vulcan OC-V GDDR6X Graphics Card. The PC is powered by the Corsair RM1000e 1000W 80 Plus Gold Fully Modular Power Supply, providing reliable and efficient power delivery for a seamless gaming experience.

product_name: Apple Mac Mini M2 chip with 8-core Processor, 10-Core GPU, 8GB Memory, 512GB Storage

Basic Information.Processor: Apple M2 chip, 8-core CPU with 4 performance & 4 efficiency cores

External I/O Ports: 2 x Thunderbolt 4 (Supports DisplayPort and Power Delivery)

description.title: Apple Mac Mini M2 chip with 8-core Processor, 10-Core GPU, 8GB Memory, 512GB Storage
description.details: The Apple Mac mini is now equipped with Apple's pro-level M2 chip, making it suited for a variety of jobs like editing huge photos and 8K ProRes video as well as more demanding applications like immersive gaming and rich presentations. The Apple M2, which makes use of 2nd-Generation 5nm process technology, merges the CPU, GPU, Neural Engine, I/O, and more into a single system on a chip (SoC). Users will be able to concurrently playback up to two streams of 8K ProRes 422 video at 30 frames per second or up to 12 streams of 4K ProRes 422 video at 30 frames per second, which is an increase of up to 2.4x over the previous generation Mac mini with M1. Filter and function performance in Adobe Photoshop is also boosted up to 50%. This is possible thanks to the M2's faster next-generation CPU and GPU, higher bandwidth memory, and a more powerful media engine for improved performance and power efficiency that includes an advanced thermal system for greater sustained performance. Adding to the Mac mini's power is 8GB of RAM and, thanks to the addition of Wi-Fi 6E (802.11ax), wireless networking will operate at up to 2.4 Gb/s. The 10-Core GPU produces images that are crisp and clear, and you can export video to an external monitor using either the built-in HDMI port or the system's Thunderbolt 4 ports, which support native DisplayPort output. With one 6K/60Hz monitor using Thunderbolt 4 and a second 5K/60Hz display using Thunderbolt 4, or a 4K/60Hz display using HDMI, this Mac mini enables up to two simultaneous displays. A 512GB SSD is included in this Mac mini for file storage. There are two Thunderbolt 4 / USB 4 ports, 10 Gb/s USB 3.1 Gen 2 ports, charging ports, and power ports for external peripherals if you want to add external peripherals. There are still two 5 Gb/s USB 3.1 Gen 1 Type-A ports available for connecting additional devices to this machine. For wired networking, a Gigabit Ethernet connector is already there. Wi-Fi 6E (802.11ax) can be used for wireless access. You can connect more compatible devices, such as keyboards, mice, and headsets, using Bluetooth 5.3 technology. Using a 3.5mm headphone jack, the sound is output. An integrated 150W power supply that uses 100-240 VAC at 50-60 Hz powers Apple's Mac mini.
